ISSUE.TITLE: Order edit page , missing State / province and country name.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.20 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: Go => Admin/Order/Edit/5 go Billing & shipping collapsible. See below picture to identify missing labels. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41533502/58384098-7cdeb600-7ffb-11e9-8be7-bea3be009f70.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3894 Fixed display of address fields in order details
